name: titan-sdk-examples
description: This repository contains simple and practical examples demonstrating how to integrate the Titan SDK in frontend projects.

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "MENU,APP1,APP2,APP3,APP4" "node server.js" "npm run dev --prefix 15-example-npm-exploring-complete-sdk-json" "npm run dev --prefix 11-example-npm-text-to-speech-3" "npm run dev --prefix 12-example-npm-text-magnification" "npm run dev --prefix 13-example-npm-app-control"
